fields.label: select a business and an advisor.
choose a business
fields.description: Choose the business relevant to this agreement.

fields.label: choose an advisor
fields.description: Choose a counterparty to be the advisor for this agreement. If you have not added a counterparty yet, click on '+ add a new counterparty'.

fields.label: enter your business's details and contact person for this document.
business legal name
fields.description: The business's full legal name including "Pty Ltd" etc if applicable.

fields.label: business trading name
fields.description: The business's trading or business name.

fields.label: business ABN
fields.description: You can lookup your ABN here: ABN Lookup

fields.label: abbreviated name of your business
fields.description: Please provide a version of your business's name that is less than 15 characters long for use throughout the document. This could be your business's name, an abbreviation or acronym of your business's name.

fields.label: business web address
fields.description:
Enter the business's website address where its Privacy Policy is located.

*Leave blank if your Privacy Policy is not available on your website.

fields.label: business address
fields.description: Enter your business's address.

fields.label: choose a contact person
fields.description: Choose a contact person for your business or fill in the form manually.

fields.label: contact person's - name
fields.description: Name of the person from your business who the advisor should report to.

fields.label: contact person's - role
fields.description: The contact person's designated title or role. (e.g. Director, authorised agent etc.).

fields.label: contact person's - email
fields.description: Provide the email address for the contact person. The draft document will be sent to this address.

fields.label: enter the advisor's details and a contact person for the advisor.
advisor's legal name
fields.description: The advisor's full legal name. Include "Pty Ltd" or other designation if they are incorporated.

fields.label: advisor's ABN
fields.description:
You can lookup your ABN here: ABN Lookup

*If they do not provide an ABN you may need to withhold tax from any payment you make to them see Withholding from Suppliers.

fields.label: advisor's business name
fields.description: The advisor's trading or business name. For an individual will be their name again. For a company it might be their name without the Pty Ltd or a registered business name.

fields.label: abbreviated name of the advisor
fields.description: Please provide a version of the advisor's name that is less than 15 characters long for use throughout the document. This could be the advisor's name, an abbreviation or acronym of the advisor's name.

fields.label: advisor's address
fields.description: Provide the advisor's business address.

fields.label: choose the advisor's contact person
fields.description: Choose a contact person on behalf of the advisor (this can be the advisor themself) or fill in the form manually.

fields.label: contact person's - name
fields.description: Name of person who should be contacted about this document on behalf of the advisor.

fields.label: contact person's - role
fields.description: What is the contact's role in the advisor's business (e.g. Principal, Director, CEO etc.)

fields.label: contact person's - email
fields.description: Provide the email for the advisor's contact person.

fields.label: state or territory of jurisdiction
fields.description: The Australian State whose laws will govern this document.

fields.label: advisor's services
fields.description: How many different services will the advisor provide? (Add up to 10) Provide details below.

fields.label: services 1
fields.description: Describe a service the advisor will provide.

fields.label: services 2
fields.description: Describe a service the advisor will provide.

fields.label: service 3
fields.description: Describe a service the advisor will provide.

fields.label: service 4
fields.description: Describe a service the advisor will provide.

fields.label: service 5
fields.description: Describe a service the advisor will provide.

fields.label: service 6
fields.description: Describe a service the advisor will provide.

fields.label: service 7
fields.description: Describe a service the advisor will provide.

fields.label: service 8
fields.description: Describe a service the advisor will provide.

fields.label: service 9
fields.description: Describe a service the advisor will provide.

fields.label: service 10
fields.description: Describe a service the advisor will provide.

fields.label: intellectual property
fields.description: Will the advisor retain ownership of intellectual property created in the course of providing the services or will it be owned by the business?

fields.label: advisors fees will be paid
fields.description: How will the advisor's fees be calculated?

fields.label: amount of advisor's fees ($AUD)
fields.description: How much will you pay the advisor per the selected time period?

fields.label: invoice due timeframe
fields.description:
How many Business Days after you receive an invoice from the contractor should it be paid?

*Business Days are days that are not a Saturday, Sunday or public holiday in the State you choose as a jurisdiction for this agreement.

fields.label: equity
fields.description: Will the advisor be receiving equity?

fields.label: equity type
fields.description: Will shares or options be issued as equity? This document does not cover other forms of equity.

fields.label: number of options
fields.description: How many options will be issued?

fields.label: option exercise price
fields.description: What is the total dollar value the advisor must pay to exercise each option?

fields.label: percentage of shares
fields.description: What percentage of the company is being offered as shares to the advisor? (Enter a number only - no % sign)

fields.label: ESOP
fields.description: Will the equity be issued under an Employee Share Scheme (ESS) / Employee Share Option Plan (ESOP)?

fields.label: nominee full name
fields.description: Please provide the full name of the entity that will hold the advisor's equity (if any). Leave blank if the equity is to be issued to the advisor personally.

fields.label: nominee ACN
fields.description: Please provide the ACN of the nominee if it is a company or corporate trustee (leave blank if not).

fields.label: commencement date
fields.description: Enter the date, from which, the advisor will be providing the services. This date can also be in the past.

fields.label: term of agreement
fields.description: How long will the agreement last? Enter a number and select a period below.

fields.label: length of agreement
fields.description: Choose the relevant period for the duration of the agreement.

fields.label: business notice period
fields.description: Enter a number here and select the period below for the notice that your business will provide the advisor before terminating the agreement.

fields.label: length of notice period
fields.description: Choose the relevant period for the length of the business's notice period.

fields.label: include advisor's notice period?
fields.description: Can the advisor terminate for convenience (i.e. if there has been no breach of the agreement by the business).

fields.label: termination notice period
fields.description: Enter a number here and select the relevant period below for the length of notice the advisor must provide to terminate the agreement.

fields.label: length of notice period
fields.description: Choose the relevant period for the length of the advisor's notice period.

fields.label: enter your signatory's details.
fields.description: The person from your business that will sign the document.

fields.label: choose a business signatory
fields.description: Choose a person to sign on behalf of your business or fill in the form manually.

fields.label: business signatory's name
fields.description: The person who will sign this agreement on behalf of your business.

fields.label: business signatory's role
fields.description: The signatory's designated title or role within your business. (e.g. Director, authorised agent etc.)

fields.label: enter your advisor's signatory details.
fields.description: The advisor or the person who will sign this document on behalf of the advisor.

fields.label: choose the advisor's signatory
fields.description: Choose a signatory on behalf of the advisor or fill in the form manually.

fields.label: advisor signatory's name
fields.description: Who will sign this agreement on the advisor's behalf?

fields.label: advisor signatory's role
fields.description: The signatory's designated title or role. Insert "Principal" if the advisor is signing or Director, authorised agent etc if someone else is signing.

confirmations.name: Default Confirmation
confirmations.message: Thanks for contacting us! We will get in touch with you shortly.

business legal name
fields.description: The business's full legal name including "Pty Ltd" etc if applicable.

fields.description: Please provide a version of your business name that is less than 15 characters long for use throughout the document. This is usually the business name, or abbreviation or acronym that your business may commonly be referred to.

fields.description: Enter your Company's address.

fields.description: The signatory's designated title or role. (e.g. Director, authorised agent etc.)

fields.label: client's legal business name

fields.label: abbreviated name of the client's business

fields.label: client's address

fields.label: choose a contact person

fields.description: Choose a signatory on behalf of the client or fill in the form manually.

fields.label: client signatory's - name
fields.description: Name of person signing this agreement on behalf of the counterparty.

fields.label: client signatory's - role
fields.description: What is the contact person's role in the Contractor's business (e.g. Director, CEO etc.)

fields.label: client signatory's - email

fields.label: notice period and termination details required.
state or territory

fields.description: What duties and responsibilities are you expected to provide to the Client? (Add up to 10)

fields.description: Which duty will you provide/perform for the client?

fields.label: duty 2
fields.description: Which duty will you provide/perform for the client?

fields.label: duty 3
fields.description: Which duty will you provide/perform for the client?

fields.label: duty 4
fields.description: Which duty will you provide/perform for the client?

fields.description: Which duty will you provide/perform for the client?

fields.description: Which duty will you provide/perform for the client?

fields.description: Which duty will you provide/perform for the client?

fields.label: duty 9
fields.description: Which duty will you provide/perform for the client?

fields.label: duty 10
fields.description: Which duty will you provide/perform for the client?

fields.label: commencement date
fields.description: From which date will you be providing the services. This date can also be in the past

fields.label: invoice due timeframe
fields.description: How many business days after the date of the Invoice, must it be paid?

fields.label: bank details
fields.description: Would you like to include bank details in the agreement for receiving payment?

fields.label: bank account name
fields.description: What is your full bank account name?

fields.label: bank account BSB
fields.description: What is your account's BSB?

fields.label: bank account number
fields.description: What is your bank account number?

fields.label: term of agreement
fields.description: How long will this Agreement last?

fields.label: late interest rate
fields.description: The per-annum interest rate to be changed for late payment.

fields.label: intellectual property
fields.description: Will the client retain ownership of intellectual property created in the course of providing the services or will it be owned by the business?

fields.label: terminate for convenience

confirmations.name: Default Confirmation
confirmations.message: Thanks for contacting us! We will get in touch with you shortly.

fields.label: select a business and a counterparty in relation to this document.
choose a lender
fields.description: Choose the business that wishes to loan money. If you have not added the business yet, click on '+ add a business'.

fields.label: choose a borrower
fields.description: Choose the counterparty you wish to loan money to. If you have not added a counterparty yet, click on '+ add a counterparty'.

fields.label: enter the lender's details and choose a contact person
lender's legal name
fields.description: This is the legal name or company name of the lender that includes "Pty Ltd" etc, if applicable.

fields.label: lender's business name
fields.description: Trading or business name of the lender. A registered name or a company's name without "Pty Ltd".

fields.label: lender's ABN
fields.description: You can lookup your ABN at ABN Lookup

fields.label: abbreviated name of the lender
fields.description: Please provide a version of the lender's name that is less than 15 characters long for use throughout the document. This could be the lender's name, an abbreviation or acronym of the lender's name.

fields.label: lender's address
fields.description: The lender's active business address.

fields.label: choose a contact person
fields.description: Choose a contact person for this agreement from the lender or fill in the form manually.

fields.label: contact person's name
fields.description: Please provide details of the person from the lender that should be contacted in relation to this agreement.

fields.label: contact person's role
fields.description: What is the contact person's role in the business (e.g. Director, CEO etc.)

fields.label: contact person's email
fields.description: Provide the email address for the contact person. The draft document will be sent to this address.

fields.label: provide the borrower's details and choose a contact person.
borrower's legal name
fields.description: Provide the borrower's full legal business name and include "Pty Ltd" etc if applicable.

fields.label: borrower's business name
fields.description: Provide the borrower's full legal business name and include "Pty Ltd" etc if applicable.

fields.label: borrower's ABN
fields.description: You can lookup your ABN at ABN Lookup

fields.label: abbreviated name of the borrower
fields.description: Please provide a version of the borrower's name that is less than 15 characters long for use throughout the document. This could be the borrower's name, an abbreviation or acronym of the borrower's name.

fields.label: borrower's address
fields.description: Provide the borrower's active business address.

fields.label: choose a contact person
fields.description: Choose a contact person for this agreement from the borrower.or fill in the form manually.

fields.label: contact person's name
fields.description: Please provide details of the person from the borrower that should be contacted in relation to this document.

fields.label: contact person's role
fields.description: What is the contact person's role with the borrower (e.g. Director, CEO etc.)

fields.label: contact person's email
fields.description: Please provide the contact person's email?

fields.label: enter the details of the loan.
date of loan
fields.description: Enter the date that the lender first advanced funds to the borrower. This date can also be in the past.

fields.label: state or territory of jurisdiction
fields.description: The Australian state or territory whose laws will govern this document.

fields.label: research & development
fields.description:
Are the lender and borrower 'associates' and is this loan for R&D services provided to the borrower by the lender?.

*If the parties are not associates then a loan agreement may not be necessary. Please seek specialist advice.

fields.label: loan advance amount
fields.description: What amount is being advanced at the start of this loan?

fields.label: total loan amount
fields.description: What is the maximum amount the lender will loan to the borrower during the term of the loan?

fields.label: interest rate
fields.description:
What rate per annum will the borrower pay the lender on the amount it borrows under this loan?

*Choose '0' if the loan is to be interest free.

fields.label: default interest rate
fields.description:
What rate of interest per annum will the borrower pay the lender if it defaults on a payment?

*Choose '0' if the borrower will not pay additional interest on default.

fields.label: term of loan
fields.description: enter a number for the term of the loan and the relevant period below.

fields.label: period of loan
fields.description: choose the relevant period for the term of the loan entered above.

fields.label: security
fields.description:
Is the loan to be secured or unsecured?

*Choose 'secured' if the loan is to be guaranteed by a third party.

fields.label: security description
fields.description:
Enter details of any documents provided by the borrower to the lender to secure the amounts provided by the lender to the borrower under this loan. Including details of any documented guarantees provided by third parties.

*Ensure you accurately describe each document providing the security for or guaranteeing the loan. Seek advice if you are unsure.

fields.label: special conditions
fields.description:
Enter any special conditions that will apply to this loan.

* Leave blanks if there are no special conditions.

fields.label: select or enter details of the lender's signatory.
choose a signatory
fields.description: Choose a signatory who will be signing this document on behalf of the lender or fill in the form manually

fields.label: lender signatory's name
fields.description: Please provide details of the person signing this agreement on behalf of the lender.

fields.label: lender signatory's role
fields.description: What is the signatory's role with the lender (e.g. Director, authorised agent etc.)

fields.label: select or enter the details for the borrower's signatory.
choose a signatory
fields.description: Choose a counterparty signatory who will be signing this document on behalf of the counterparty or fill in the form manually

fields.label: borrower signatory's name
fields.description: Please provide details of the person signing this agreement on behalf of the borrower.

fields.label: borrower signatory's role
fields.description: What is the signatory's role in the borrower's business (e.g. Director, authorised agent etc.)

fields.description: Email address of the employee for this agreement.

fields.description: Address of the employee for this agreement.

business legal name

fields.description: The business's trading or business name.

fields.description: Please provide a version of your business's name that is less than 15 characters long for use throughout the document. This could be your business's name, an abbreviation or acronym of your business's name.

fields.label: business address
fields.description: Enter your business's address.

fields.label: enter the details of the person who will sign on behalf of the business.
choose a signatory
fields.description: Choose a signatory on behalf of your business or fill in the form manually.

fields.label: business signatory's - name
fields.description: The person who will signing this Employment Agreement on behalf of your business.

fields.label: business signatory's - role
fields.description: The signatory's designated title or role within your business. (e.g. Director, authorised agent etc.)

fields.label: enter the employee's duties, hours and remuneration.
employee's duties and responsibilities
fields.description: How many duties and responsibilities is the Employee expected to provide? (Add up to 10) Provide details below.

fields.label: duty 1
fields.description: Which duty will the Employee perform/provide?

fields.label: duty 2
fields.description: Which duty will the Employee perform/provide?

fields.label: duty 3
fields.description: Which duty will the Employee perform/provide?

fields.label: duty 4
fields.description: Which duty will the Employee perform/provide?

fields.label: duty 5
fields.description: Which duty will the Employee perform/provide?

fields.label: duty 6
fields.description: Which duty will the Employee perform/provide?

fields.label: duty 7
fields.description: Which duty will the Employee perform/provide?

fields.label: duty 8
fields.description: Which duty will the Employee perform/provide?

fields.label: duty 9
fields.description: Which duty will the Employee perform/provide?

fields.label: duty 10
fields.description: Which duty will the Employee perform/provide?

fields.label: work hours
fields.errorMessage: By law the maximum number of hours an employee can be expected to work in a week is 38
fields.description:
How many hours per week will the employee be required to work?
*maximum hours are 38 in Australia.

fields.label: start time
fields.description: When do your normal work hours start?

fields.label: finish time
fields.description: When do your normal work hours end?

fields.label: employee will be paid
fields.description: How will the employee be paid?

fields.label: remuneration ($AUD)
fields.description: How much will you pay the employee per the selected time period?

fields.label: superannuation
fields.description: Will the remuneration be inclusive or exclusive of superannuation?

fields.label: enter the employment term and termination details.
commencement date
fields.description:
From which date will the employee be providing the services.
*This date can also be in the past if the employee has already started work.

fields.label: is this a fixed term agreement?
fields.description:
This agreement can either be for a fixed term or ongoing. Both fixed term and ongoing agreements can be terminated by the employee or the employer by giving 4 week's written notice (except during a probation period where only 1 week's notice is required).

*Termination is subject to compliance with applicable employment laws, Enterprise Bargaining Agreements and Modern Awards. Seek legal advice of you are unsure about termination. You can can get quick guidance using our chat service below (requires a paid subscription) or you can book some time to Talk to a Lawyer.

fields.label: fixed term?
fields.description: Enter a number and select the length below.

fields.label: term of agreement
fields.description: Choose the length of the term.

fields.label: probation period (months)
fields.errorMessage: Probation periods should not be longer than 6 months. After 6 months an employee may have the right to claim unfair dismissal (12 months for small businesses).
fields.description:
Probation periods reduce the length of notice required to be given by the employee and the employer to 1 week. After the probation period notice will increase to 4 weeks for both. Typically probation periods are either 3 or 6 months.

*Leave blank if you don't want a probation period. Seek legal advice of you are unsure about probation periods and termination. You can can get quick guidance using our chat service (requires a silver subscription or above) or you can book some time to Talk to a Lawyer.

fields.label: enter location reporting and post employment restrictions.
state of jurisdiction

choices.value: the State of New South Wales

fields.description: The Australian State or Territory where the employee is employed.

fields.label: choose a supervisor
fields.description: Choose the person who the employee will report to or fill in the form manually.

fields.label: supervisor's name
fields.description: Name of the person the employee will report to.

fields.label: supervisor's role
fields.description: What is the supervisor's role in the business (e.g. Director, CEO etc.)

fields.label: supervisor's email
fields.description: The draft agreement will be emailed to this email address.

fields.label: include a non-solicitation clause?
fields.description:
Do you want to prevent the employee from joining a competitor or soliciting clients/customers during and after the term of their employment?

*Please note non-solicitation periods are only enforceable in specific circumstances. Seek legal advice of you are unsure about probation periods and termination. You can can get quick guidance using our chat service (requires a silver subscription or above) or you can book some time to Talk to a Lawyer.

fields.label: non-solicitation period
fields.description: Insert a number and select months or years below for how long the employee be restricted from soliciting or working with your business' customers/clients after termination of their employment.

fields.label: length of the non-solicitation period
fields.description: Choose the length of the non-solicitation period.

state of jurisdiction
fields.description: Choose the state whose courts will have jurisdiction to hear disputes regarding this agreement.

fields.label: effective date
fields.description: The date from which the confidentiality will apply. This can be date prior to the signing of the agreement.

fields.label: concept description
fields.description: Please describe the concept or intellectual property you want to prevent being disclosed

fields.label: purpose of disclosure

choices.text: Counterparty providing services to you regarding the Concept.
Discussing and negotiating any further agreements for the further development of the Concept.
Determining whether the parties wish to enter into further business relations with each other.

inputs.label: Counterparty providing services to you regarding the Concept.
Discussing and negotiating any further agreements for the further development of the Concept.
Determining whether the parties wish to enter into further business relations with each other.

fields.description: In addition to 'determining whether the parties wish to do further business together', select which of these purposes also apply

company legal name
fields.description: The company's full legal name including "Pty Ltd" or "Limited" as applicable.

fields.description: The company's trading or business name.

fields.description: The Australian state or territory whose laws will govern the appointment.

fields.label: commencement date
fields.description: From which date will the director be appointed. This date can also be in the past.

fields.label: number of days?
fields.description: What's the minimum number of work days per month?

fields.label: director's fees
fields.description: How much will the director be paid per annum?

fields.description: Will the non-executive director be paid an additional fee if they are appointed to be chairman of the Board?

fields.label: abbreviated name of the borrower

fields.label: contact person's email
fields.description: Provide the email address for the contact person. The draft document will be sent to this address.

fields.label: enter the details of the loan.
date of loan
fields.description: Enter the date that the lender first advanced funds to the borrower. This date can also be in the past.

fields.label: state or territory of jurisdiction
fields.description: The Australian state or territory whose laws will govern this document.

fields.label: research & development
fields.description:
Are the lender and borrower 'associates' and is this loan for R&D services provided to the borrower by the lender?.

*If the parties are not associates then a loan agreement may not be necessary. Please seek specialist advice.

fields.label: loan advance amount
fields.description: What amount is being advanced at the start of this loan?

fields.label: total loan amount
fields.description: What is the maximum amount the lender will loan to the borrower during the term of the loan?

fields.label: interest rate
fields.description:
What rate per annum will the borrower pay the lender on the amount it borrows under this loan?

*Choose '0' if the loan is to be interest free.

fields.label: default interest rate
fields.description:
What rate of interest per annum will the borrower pay the lender if it defaults on a payment?

*Choose '0' if the borrower will not pay additional interest on default.

fields.label: term of loan
fields.description: enter a number for the term of the loan and the relevant period below.

fields.label: period of loan
fields.description: choose the relevant period for the term of the loan entered above.

fields.label: security
fields.description:
Is the loan to be secured or unsecured?

*Choose 'secured' if the loan is to be guaranteed by a third party.

fields.label: security description
fields.description:
Enter details of any documents provided by the borrower to the lender to secure the amounts provided by the lender to the borrower under this loan. Including details of any documented guarantees provided by third parties.

*Ensure you accurately describe each document providing the security for or guaranteeing the loan. Seek advice if you are unsure.

fields.label: special conditions
fields.description:
Enter any special conditions that will apply to this loan.

* Leave blanks if there are no special conditions.

fields.label: select or enter details of the borrower's signatory.
choose a signatory
fields.description: Choose a signatory who will be signing this document on behalf of the borrower or fill in the form manually

fields.label: borrower signatory's name
fields.description: Please provide details of the person signing this agreement on behalf of the borrower.

fields.label: borrower signatory's role
fields.description: What is the signatory's role with the borrower (e.g. Director, authorised agent etc.)

fields.label: select or enter the details for the lender's signatory.
choose a signatory
fields.description: Choose a lender signatory who will be signing this document on behalf of the lender or fill in the form manually

fields.label: lender signatory's name
fields.description: Please provide details of the person signing this agreement on behalf of the lender.

fields.label: lender signatory's role
fields.description: What is the signatory's role in the lender's business (e.g. Director, authorised agent etc.)

confirmations.message: Thanks for contacting us! We will get in touch with you shortly.

fields.label: select a business and a counterparty.
choose a business
fields.description: Choose the business that is claiming the outstanding debt

fields.label: choose a counterparty (debtor)
fields.description: Choose the counterparty that owes the outstanding debt. If you have not added a counterparty yet, click on '+ Add a new counterparty'.

fields.label: enter the details of your business and the person who will send the Letter of Demand on behalf of your business.
business's legal name
fields.description: The full legal name for the business including "Pty Ltd" etc if applicable.

fields.label: business's trading or business name
fields.description: Your business's trading or business name.

fields.label: business ABN
fields.description: You can lookup your ABN here: ABN Lookup

fields.label: abbreviated name of your business
fields.description: Please provide a version of your business's name that is less than 15 characters long for use throughout the document. This could be your business's name, an abbreviation or acronym of your business's name.

fields.label: business address
fields.description: Enter your business's address.

fields.label: choose a business signatory
fields.description: Choose a business signatory as the signatory for your business or fill in the form manually.

fields.label: business signatory's name
fields.description: Name of person sending the letter of demand on behalf of your business.

fields.label: business signatory's role
fields.description: The signatory's designated title or role.

fields.label: business signatory's email
fields.description: The draft document will be emailed to this address.

fields.label: Enter the details of the Debtor and the contact person that will be receiving the Letter of Demand
Debtor's legal name
fields.description: Provide the Debtor's full legal name including "Pty Ltd" etc if applicable.

fields.label: Debtor's ABN
fields.description: You can lookup their ABN here: ABN Lookup

fields.label: Debtor's trading or business name
fields.description: The trading or business name of the debtor

fields.label: abbreviated name of the Debtor's business
fields.description: Please provide a version of the debtor's name that is less than 15 characters long for use throughout the document. This could be the counterparty's name, an abbreviation or acronym of the counterparty's name.

fields.label: Debtor's address
fields.description: Provide the debtor's business address.

fields.label: choose a contact person for the Debtor
fields.description: Choose a counterparty signatory as the signatory for the counterparty or fill in the form manually.

fields.label: Debtor's contact person's name
fields.description: Name of person to receive the letter of demand on behalf of the debtor.

fields.label: Debtor contact person's email
fields.description:
The email address of the person that will receive the Letter of Demand for the Debtor.

NB: It is recommended that the letter also be sent by mail.

fields.label: Name of Agreement
fields.description: What is your agreement with the debtor called. E.g. Service Agreement, Terms of Business, Terms of Trade, Terms and Conditions, Contractor Agreement etc.

fields.label: Goods or Services Supplied
fields.description: What kind of goods or service were supplied to the debtor?

fields.label: How many outstanding invoices
fields.description: How many invoices has the debtor not paid? (Add up to 10) Provide details below.

fields.label: Invoice 1 Reference
fields.description: Invoice number or reference.

fields.label: Invoice 1 Amount
fields.description: Total value owing on the invoice. Don't include $.

fields.label: Invoice 2 Reference
fields.description: Invoice number or reference.

fields.label: Invoice 2 Amount
fields.description: Total value owing on the invoice. Don't include $.

fields.label: Invoice 3 Reference
fields.description: Invoice number or reference.

fields.label: Invoice 3 Amount
fields.description: Total value owing on the invoice. Don't include $.

fields.label: Invoice 4 Reference
fields.description: Invoice number or reference.

fields.label: Invoice 4 Amount
fields.description: Total value owing on the invoice. Don't include $.

fields.label: Invoice 5 Reference
fields.description: Invoice number or reference.

fields.label: Invoice 5 Amount
fields.description: Total value owing on the invoice. Don't include $.

fields.label: Invoice 6 Reference
fields.description: Invoice number or reference.

fields.label: Invoice 6 Amount
fields.description: Total value owing on the invoice. Don't include $.

fields.label: Invoice 7 Reference
fields.description: Invoice number or reference.

fields.label: Invoice 7 Amount
fields.description: Total value owing on the invoice. Don't include $.

fields.label: Invoice 8 Reference
fields.description: Invoice number or reference.

fields.label: Invoice 8 Amount
fields.description: Total value owing on the invoice. Don't include $.

fields.label: Invoice 9 Reference
fields.description: Invoice number or reference.

fields.label: Invoice 9 Amount
fields.description: Total value owing on the invoice. Don't include $.

fields.label: Invoice 10 Reference
fields.description: Invoice number or reference.

fields.label: Invoice 10 Amount
fields.description: Total value owing on the invoice. Don't include $.

fields.label: Date you will send the Letter of Demand

confirmations.name: Default Confirmation
confirmations.message: Thanks for contacting us! We will get in touch with you shortly.

14.title: Contractor Agreement (Client) (copy of original)
14.description: This is a copy of the original before Shoshana started messing with the original (on the staging site).

fields.label: select a business and a contractor.
choose a business
fields.description: Choose the business that wishes to engage a contractor.

fields.label: choose a contractor
fields.description: Choose the counterparty as the contractor. If you have not added a counterparty yet, click on '+ add a new counterparty'.

fields.label: enter your business's details and a contact person for this document.
business legal name
fields.description: The business's full legal name including "Pty Ltd" etc if applicable.

fields.label: business trading name
fields.description: The business's trading or business name.

fields.label: business ABN
fields.description: You can lookup your ABN at ABN Lookup

fields.label: abbreviated name of your business
fields.description: Please provide a version of your business's name that is less than 15 characters long for use throughout the document. This could be your business's name, an abbreviation or acronym of your business's name.

fields.label: business web address
fields.description:
Enter the business's website address where its Privacy Policy is located.

*Leave blank if your Privacy Policy is not available on your website.

fields.label: business address
fields.description: Enter the business's address.

fields.label: choose a contact person
fields.description: Choose a person as the contact for this agreement or fill in the form manually.

fields.label: contact person's name
fields.description: Name of the person from your business who the contractor should report to.

fields.label: contact person's role
fields.description: The contact person's designated title or role. (e.g. Director, authorised agent etc.).

fields.label: contact person's email
fields.description: Provide the email address for the contact person. The draft document will be sent to this address.

fields.label: enter the contractor's details and a contact person for the contractor.
contractor's legal name
fields.description: The contractor's full legal name. Include "Pty Ltd" or other designation if they are incorporated.

fields.label: contractor's ABN
fields.description:
You can lookup their ABN at ABN Lookup.

*If they do not provide an ABN you may need to withhold tax from any payment you make to them see Withholding from Suppliers.

fields.label: contractor's trading or business name
fields.description: The contractor's trading or business name.

fields.label: abbreviated name of the contractor's business
fields.description: Please provide a version of the contractor's name that is less than 15 characters long for use throughout the document. This could be the contractor's name, an abbreviation or acronym of the contractor's name.

fields.label: contractor's address
fields.description: Provide the contractor's business address.

fields.label: choose a contact person
fields.description: Choose a contact person on behalf of the contractor (this can be the contractor themself) or fill in the form manually.

fields.label: contact person's - name
fields.description: Name of person who should be contacted about this document on behalf of the contractor.

fields.label: contact person's - role
fields.description: What is the contact person's role in the contractor's business (e.g. Director, CEO etc.)

fields.label: contact person's - email
fields.description: Provide the email for the contractor's contact person.

fields.label: state or territory
fields.description: The Australian state or territory whose laws will govern this document.

fields.label: contractor services
fields.description: What Services will the contractor provide? (include up to 10). Provide details below:

fields.label: intellectual property
fields.description: Will the contractor retain ownership of intellectual property created in the course of providing the services or will it be owned by the business?

fields.label: contractor's fees will be paid
fields.description: How will the contractor's fees be calculated?

fields.label: amount of fees ($AUD)
fields.description: How much will you pay the contractor per the selected time period?

fields.label: invoice due timeframe
fields.description:
How many Business Days after you receive an invoice from the contractor should it be paid?

*Business Days are days that are not a Saturday, Sunday or public holiday in the State you choose as a jurisdiction for this agreement.

fields.label: commencement date
fields.description: Enter the date, from which, the contractor will be providing the services. This date can also be in the past.

fields.label: term of agreement
fields.description: How long will this agreement last?

fields.label: length of agreement
fields.description: Choose the length of the agreement.

fields.label: business notice period
fields.description: Enter a number here and select the period below for the notice that your business will provide the contractor before terminating the agreement.

fields.label: length of notice period
fields.description: Choose the relevant period for the length of the business's notice period.

fields.label: include contractor's notice period?
fields.description: Can the contractor terminate for convenience (i.e. if there has been no breach of the agreement by the business).

fields.label: contractor notice period
fields.description: Enter a number here and select the relevant period below for the length of notice the contractor must provide to terminate the agreement.

fields.label: length of contractor notice period
fields.description: Choose the relevant period for the length of the contractor's notice period.

fields.label: choose a business signatory
fields.description: Choose a signatory on behalf of your business or fill in the form manually.

fields.label: business signatory's name
fields.description: Who will sign this agreement on behalf of your business?

fields.label: business signatory's role
fields.description: The signatory's designated title or role. (e.g. Director, authorised agent etc.)

fields.label: choose the contractor's signatory
fields.description: Choose a signatory on behalf of the contractor or fill in the form manually.

fields.label: contractor signatory's name
fields.description: Who will sign this agreement on the contractor's behalf?

fields.label: contractor signatory's role
fields.description: The signatory's designated title or role. (e.g. Director, authorised agent etc.)

notifications.name: Save and Continue Email
notifications.subject: Link to continue {form_title}
notifications.message:
Thank you for saving {form_title}. Please use the unique link below to return to the form from any computer.

{save_link}

Remember that the link will expire after 30 days so please return via the provided link to complete your form submission.

confirmations.name: Save and Continue Confirmation
confirmations.message:
Please use the following link to return and complete this form from any computer.

{save_link}

Note: This link will expire after 30 days.
Enter your email address if you would like to receive the link via email.

{save_email_input}

confirmations.name: Save and Continue Email Sent Confirmation
confirmations.message: Success!The link was sent to the following email address: {save_email}
